features: Protects, Conditions, Soothes: Transform the daily grind of shaving into a routine that actually leaves your skin feeling clean, fresh & invigorated. This shaving cream will help protect your skin and prep for a close shave. Soothing shaving cream for men & women

Fresh Masculine Scent: Our shave cream is lightly scented with a clean balance of aloe and citrus followed by a woody base. A conditioning shaving cream with Shea Butter and Coconut Oil to soothe skin while forming a barrier to prep face for a close shave

Experience The MARLOWE. Difference: Our men's shaving cream is crafted with a unique combination of natural ingredients like Shea Butter and Coconut Oil to help soften the skin. This shave cream will make you ditch the canned stuff for good

No Bad Stuff & Made Right Here: MARLOWE. hair & skin care products are SLS,SLES, paraben and phthalate-free, cruelty-free and made in the USA with globally sourced ingredients. High-quality face, shave and body care essentials designed to elevate your lifestyle

The MARLOWE. Man: Men need hair & skin care too, but it doesn't have to be complicated. We believe that life is complicated enough. Looking good and feeling amazing shouldn’t have to be. MARLOWE. engineers products that work as hard as you do

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Product Highlights: This conditioning men's shaving cream is made with shea butter and coconut oil designed to soothe skin while forming a smooth barrier on the skin to prep your face for a close shave.For an even deeper hydrating experience, use our No. 144 Post Shave Lotion directly after shaving.
Smells Amazing: Our shaving cream is lightly scented with a clean balance of aloe and citrus followed by a woody base.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth, Simple, and Woodsy.
reviews.reviewText: Title sums it up. I have tried many brands. Marlowe is my favorite. All their men’s products are lightly scented and not harsh. Everything they have is smooth and great. Worth the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick beard? Buy this!
reviews.reviewText: If you think you have a tough beard, you're wrong. My razors usually last me 2 shaves at most. I've tried absolutely every thing offered but this blew my mind. Holy cow guys, this is incredible! I'm going to save money with this!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Best shaving cream I've used in 5 years, but can cause minor skin irritation
reviews.reviewText: This shaving cream has given me the closest & smoothest shave I've had in a long time (at least 5 years), & I've tried at least 6-7 different brands of shaving cream in these last ~5 years. My face feels as smooth as a newborn baby's cheeks after shaving with this cream. However, the only flaw of this product that I've observed is that it can cause a slight skin irritation (a mild burning sensation) if I don't wash my face off immediately after a shave. That said, there has not been any facial appearance changes (e.g. skin rashes, redness) due to the aforementioned irritation, & as long as I wash my face or shower right away, I can easily avoid any irritation.Bottom line - I'm still highly satisfied with the purchase, I think I finally found a shaving cream that gives me the best looking & most comfortable shave, & I'll likely make this my default shaving cream.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best of the best

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality but Pricey
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the better shave creams I've tried. I've been looking for a replacement for a discontinued product. It's completely clear when it goes on, which I don't prefer, but rubbing it in a bit turns it white enough to have some contrast. It is very slick and helps the blade move smoothly but unlike some others out there, doesn't leave any oily residue on my hands or face. I'd make this my go-to if it wasn't for the crazy high price. So instead, I'll keep a bottle around for special occasions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars A Little Disappointed
reviews.reviewText: Overall disappointed. After researching their products I expected a better shaving cream. The scent was not appealing and overall lather of the cream was not to par. I've tried several different products and so far Pacific Shaving Co. Caffeinated Shaving Cream has been the most pleasant and best shave for me. Always trial and error with products and to each his own with what works best.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than Cremo, for me
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is great! Quick background, I have thick hair and sensitive skin, so finding products that work has been a journey. Cremo is great, but I found I had to use a ton of it for good results. Now this Marlowe shave cream with Prorasso pre-shave cream, Personna Med-Prep Blades, and a Viking Blades Emperor Augustus razor is about as good as it's gotten for me so far.Tube will probably last a while. I use about a quarter-sized dollop. Make sure to lather it up a bit, but you definitely don't need a brush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars OVERALL I AM VERY SATISFIED
reviews.reviewText: what I like most it goes on where I put it. its easy to direct just the spot to put it, its not so thick. i got a very nice shave.
I wasted half of my life without this . Wish i could have this earlier. This is magic. My worn out razor works likenew. No pizza face. The blade just glides. No words to express. I m blessed now.
Great shave cream works very well, couldn’t be happier
